Name: Hawksbill Turtle
Fun Facts: Known for their narrow, pointed beak.
Threats: Rising seas, pollution, loss of coral reefs

Name: Saola
Location: Annamite Mountains of Vietnam and Laos.
Fun Facts: Also known as the "Asian Unicorn", Discovered first in 1992, Lives 8-11 years in the wild

Name: Sunda Tiger
Habitat: Tropical broadleaf evergreen forests, freshwater swamp forests and peat swamps
Fun Facts: Fewer than 400 exist today, Smallest species of tigers
